mapper.select: SELECT machine_id as machineId, ip, name, register_date as registerDate, sid, config, user_id as userId, env FROM rms_db.machine;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rms_db.machine (machine_id, ip, name, sid, config, register_date, user_id, env) VALUE (#{machineId}, #{ip}, #{name}, #{sid}, #{config}, #{registerDate}, #{userId}, #{env});
